approx. 2.5 " long (including ear wires) 

All findings, hand-forged ear wires, & metals are handcrafted from sterling silver & fine silver.

Amethyst is believed to be a meditative and calming stone.  This gem brings the wearer emotional stability, and inner strength; as well as courage, freedom, enhanced intuition, and spiritual nourishment.

name: Trina Circle Earrings
description:
The giddy smile you’ve been holding in all day starts to form on your face as you ride back to the office in a taxi cab.

You look to your left at your coworker, Jane. She grins through her red lips. She can’t believe it either.

Holy crap. You just landed the biggest client account of your career. 

And the best part? It was so easy. 

“We have to celebrate tonight.” Jane asserts. “How can we not? Besides, it is Friday.” 

In your mind, you're already celebrating. You feel fabulous in every way. Just like you knew you would when you got dressed this morning and slipped on your Trina Circle earrings.

“You’ve got this” you had told yourself in the mirror before you left for work.

Guess what? You were so right.

•	The silver wire has a thickness of approx.. 1.6mm.

•	The diameter of each circle is approx.. 1.5” (3.8cm).

•	The earrings fall 2.5” below your ears.

•	Palladium sterling is a sterling silver alloy containing 3.0% palladium. Why does that matter? It gives your jewelry even more luster and tarnish resistance (thank goodness).

•	More of a gold girl? You can have these earrings in 14kt or 18KT gold upon request. Simply send an email to hello@amykozak.com.



<center>COMPLIMENTARY SHIPPING FOR U.S. ORDERS</center>

name: Lila Trio Necklace - Green Quartz
description:
Everyone wears black to cocktail parties. But you know that your green quartz necklace will never stand out with a typical black dress. That’s why you bought it. Besides – cream, gold, and green are soul mates. And then you realize - you already have the perfect dress! It’s a structured, cream-colored cocktail dress with a slight golden sheen. The strappy, metallic heels you’ve picked out definitely won’t take away from the gems around your neck. The little hand is on the seven, the big one on the nine. Fifteen minutes to get ready? That’s plenty of time when you have an outfit this fabulous. • A trio of green quartz briolettes. • This is a 17" 14KT gold-filled chain (44cm) and comes with a 2" extension (5cm). • Petite gemstone rondelles are wire-wrapped at each end and secure the clasp and extension onto the necklace. • The trio of green quartz extends approx. 1.5" (4cm) from the main necklace (each stone measures approx. 6 x8mm). • All findings and metal are 14kt gold-filled. • Quartz is thought to promote hope, happiness and optimism while awakening us to the beauty of nature. Plus, it looks great around your neck, darling. • Prefer another gemstone or metal? This necklace can be handcrafted in a variety of other gemstones & metal combinations - just for you! Simply send an email to hello@amykozak.com.
COMPLIMENTARY SHIPPING FOR U.S. ORDERS

name: Isabella Necklace - Green Quartz & Sterling Silver
description:
You look up from your newspaper to see the waiter setting a cappuccino on your table. “Madamoiselle,” he says as the saucer clings onto the round tabletop. 

You don’t understand the paper. After all, it’s written in French. But it doesn’t much matter. You take a sip of your cappuccino.

Ever since you put on your black lace cap sleeve blouse and Isabella necklace this morning, something inside of you came alive. 

Your Isabella necklace? It’s a nod to times past—to Hemingway, Fitzgerald, and even Woody Allen’s more recent film, Midnight in Paris. 

When you wear it, the scenery suddenly looks more like a Van Gogh. You walk a little slower on the cobblestone streets. You order a cappuccino at a café and spend hours staring at a French newspaper that you can barely read. You stop looking at your watch. 


You are in Paris, after all.


•	This sterling silver necklace is 17” (44cm) long with a 2” (5cm) extension.

•	The hand-forged, beaded circle pendant measures approx.. 1.5” (4cm) in diameter.

•	It’s no coincidence that this necklace makes you melt into the present moment. Quartz is thought to promote hope, happiness and optimism while awakening us to the beauty of nature.

•	Your green quartz briolette is 15x16mm of sparkling beauty.

<center>COMPLIMENTARY SHIPPING FOR U.S. ORDERS</center>

Quartz crystals are thought to promote hope, happiness and optimism while awakening us to the beauty of nature.
